body.name: 30W iPhone 15 Pro Max Charger[MFi Certified], USB C Fast Charger 30W iPad Pro Charger Block with 6FT Long USB C to USB C Charging Cable for iPhone 15 Pro Max/15 Pro/15/Plus, iPad Pro 12.9/11, White

features: 【30W USB C iPhone 15 Charger Fast Charging】 The PD 30W USB C iPhone 15 Pro Max Fast Charger with 6ft extra long USB C to USB C fast charger cable provide Max 20W output power, charge your iPhone 15 Pro Max up to 65% in just 30mins, 10% faster than the original 20W USB charge.

【iPhone Fast Charger Compatibility】Extra long iPhone USB C to USB C charger cord is perfectly compatible with new version iPhone 15/ iPhone 15 Plus/ iPhone 15 Pro/ iPhone 15 Pro Max. Please be noted that iPhone 14/13/12/11 Pro Max/ iPhone X/XR/XS etc. are NOT suitable for this USB C to USB C charging cable.

【Superior Safety MFi Certified iPhone Fast Charger】 The 30W USB C iPhone 15 charger fast charging has multi protection safety system to protect your devices from over current, over voltage, short circuit and overheating, etc. This iPhone 15 charger fast charging match the current required by the device automatically, charge your device fast, safely and steadily.

【6FT USB C Charging Cable】The PD 30W USB C iPhone 15 Fast Charger is equipped with extra longer 6FT USB C to C cable, offering a user-friendly reversible design and longer charging distance, fast charging and up to 480Mbps data transfer speed. Take the super long charger with you wherever you go, ensuring that you never run out of power when you need it the most. Ideal for worldwide travel with your partner!

【What You Get】 2 Pack PD 30W USB C iPhone 15 Fast Charger Blocks and 2 Pack 6FT extra long USB C to USB C Fast Charging Data Sync Cables. Also comes with a 1-year worry-free warranty and 24/7 friendly customer service. Any problems with this iPhone 15 fast charger, please contact us for fast support and we will reply within 24hrs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Intelligent Chip 2 Fast Charging 3 Suitable for Home 4 Temporary Charging

Can this 30W USB C fast charger charge iPhone 15 series? Yes, this iPhone fast charger is with USB C to USB C charging cables, with MFi certified, compatible for newest iPhone 15 series. Will this iPhone fast charger also be compatible for iPhone 14/13/12/11/XR series? No. This charger kit is with USB C to USB C charging cable rather than lightning cable, thus it is not suitable for iPhone 14 13 12 11 XR series. How fast for this Type c charger charges a iPhone 15 pro max? Super fast charge for iPhone 15 Pro Max from 0% to 65% in just 30min, 10% faster than those original 20W chargers. Can this USB C to USB C charger cable be used to transfer data? This USB C cable is up to 480 Mbps data transfer speed. You can transfer your data from phone to laptop with a very quick speed. Will this charger also can charge my iPad device? It is suitable for iPad mini, iPad 10th, iPad air 4/5, iPad Pro 12.9''/11''.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super fast charger. Tight fit for ophone 15. Works also for samsung 21 ultra. Good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, charges fast

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works on Samsung Galaxy S21
reviews.reviewText: This is advertised for *iPhone 15 Pro* Max Fast Charger .. but we have Android phones (Galaxy S21) and they WORK!Very FAST charging on our Samsung phones - AND - they also work to charge my Oculus gaming headset.I've purchased these fast chargers twice - highly satisfied - this time I chose blue, and it's pretty - just as shown in the ad photo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality product and really fast charging
reviews.reviewText: It really is a fast charger, plug in my I Phone and in 10 minutes went from 23% to 45%.Nice packing and presentation , amazing quality . Love the 10 feet cord , don’t need to move near the outlet if you are using and need to charge it.Great product. Highly recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works good and charges as quickly as the out of the box Apple charger. Wound up returning because I no longer needed them. Was able to get my refund immediately after dropping off at Whole Foods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cord only lasted 8 months
reviews.reviewText: This was a really good deal so I would purchase again if I needed to. However, one of the cords just stopped working after 8 months. The bricks both work, with the second cord. My portable charger works, but only with the one ("second") cord. I've had so many chargers in the past and never have I had a cord just stop working after such a short period of time. That being said, the product is overall good and worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super fast charger for my Galaxy S22
reviews.reviewText: Very fast charger for all my Galaxy phones. Nice long cords, too!
